WorkItem.ClosedComment:
THANK YOU !!!

Are you the only one to have tried this framework ;) I can't imagine such a bug, but actually it was there.

I have published the corrected version, i.e. NCalc 1.3.1
WorkItem.Description: In version 1.3 of NCalc, the expression 2*2*2*2 produces the value 4.  Is there a way to avoid this behavior other than 2*(2*(2*2))) ?
